title: Animals: General (Usefulness 2)
description: Traveler usefulness 2/10 phrases for the General subcategory within Animals. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: The sea turtle is swimming in the sea.
cards.romaji: Umigame ga umi o oyoide iru.
cards.japanese: 海亀が海を泳いでいる。

cards.english: The brown rabbit is eating leaves in the garden.
cards.romaji: Chairoi usagi ga niwa de happa o tabete iru.
cards.japanese: 茶色い兎が庭で葉っぱを食べている。
